nodes.text:
Carry Identification was an Imperial propaganda poster. It was written in High Galactic and read "ATTENTION IMPERIAL SUBJECTS:
REMEMBER: ALWAYS CARRY YOUR IDENTIFICATION. YOUR SAFETY DEPENDS ON IT." It also had a stormtrooper helmet emblazoned at the center of the Imperial crest, plus four other Imperial crests around the corners of the poster. In Aurebesh there is text at the top stating "Failure to produce identification on demand is grounds for immediate imperial adjudication" and text at the bottom stating "By order of his royal highness, Emperor Palpatine, Imperial Decree 3263827"
